page.title: 06MINING PAST-CROSSGATES 2
page.content: Some names of the pits include:- {Engine,Bye,Raes,Plantain,Parrot,Mary and{Willie.}The only pits working were the{Plantain,Willie}and{Parrot.}The total working was{175},an increase from{134}in{1842}. By{1857}the{Willie,Plantain}and{ {Parrot}pits had been abandoned,as the coal was exhausted.The pits now being used were called{Queen}and{Albert.}The number of workers had increased to{ {246.}The wages varied from{4-5s}a day. Nowadays all the collieries have been closed down but airshafts are still being found.
